staged.title: Changes Staged Successfully
staged.editHint: Edit as needed, then copy and use with
staged.step1: Open your project in your IDE or terminal

stagedInProject.title: Changes Staged in Project
stagedInProject.description: This task's changes have been staged in your main project.
stagedInProject.descriptionWithDate: This task's changes have been staged in your main project on {{date}}.

noWorkspace.title: No Workspace Found
noWorkspace.description: No isolated workspace was found for this task. The changes may have been made directly in your project.
